text: Tomadera ke'u ki caya ye, tadera khejura o angurera ekati bagana thakabe, yara padadese nadi prabahita thakabe ebam yetate tara jan'ya sabarakamera phalamula thakabe. Ara se byaktike bardhakya abastha peye basabe ebam tara kichu durbala santana-santati thakabe, tarapara tara (e baganera) upara eka agnijhara ghurnijhara apatita haye ta jbale yabe?
